item.title: EPISODE 11 - Season 2 Finished
item.author: MKLOSt@gmail.com
item.description: What's Happnin?! The writers are on stike! Whaaa? Why? We try to comprehend it. Afterwards, we read a listener theory explaining their thoughts on "Jacob". Very interesting! Also, we go through the rest of season 2 quotes. Stay tuned for episode 12! We will begin our season 3 quotes. Enjoy! PS. All new episodes will be located on www.mklost.com from here on out.
item.itunes:author: MK LOST
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 11 - Season 2 Finished
item.itunes:summary: What's Happnin?! The writers are on stike! Whaaa? Why? We try to comprehend it. Afterwards, we read a listener theory explaining their thoughts on "Jacob". Very interesting! Also, we go through the rest of season 2 quotes. Stay tuned for episode 12! We will begin our season 3 quotes. Enjoy! PS. All new episodes will be located on www.mklost.com from here on out.
item.itunes:keywords: LOST, Podcasts, ABC, The matt and kevin show, MKlost

item.title: Episode 5 - Watership Down Fake Audition
item.author: MKLOSt@gmail.com
item.description: Hello LOST fans!! In this episode we discuss Watership Down. Don't know what that is? You remember, Sawyer was reading it! Also, was there an audition leaked? Fact or fiction? Help us figure it out! Oh, and come talk LOST with us in our forums on www.mklost.com. Enjoy the show!!
